DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of slices taken from an area that is situated centrally in the specimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A point or area that is approximately central within some larger region or structure._Slice; a thin flat piece cut off of some object.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Property.preferredDefinition: A point or area that is approximately central within some larger region or structure.:Slice; a thin flat piece cut off of some object.

Concepts.definition: A point or area that is approximately central within some larger region or structure.
A thin flat piece cut off of some object; anything resembling such an object.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11/19/18 jk upd reg status from Application to Qualified; added MCL CSI reference.  10/30/2017 wz created for DCP NWU datatype and size constraint. 09/15/2021 it added the number of decimal places (4)
